data.title: Cpl. Arthur L. Albe
data.meta_description: July, 24, 1945 --- Cpl. Arthur L. Albe was killed June 17 on Okinawa two days after he landed, his mother, Mrs. Ruby Albe of 812 South 14th Street, Newark, has been notified. Albe, 19, was born in Newark and lived in Verona two years before moving back to Newark six years ago. He attended…
data.text:
July, 24, 1945 — Cpl. Arthur L. Albe was killed June 17 on Okinawa two days after he landed, his mother, Mrs. Ruby Albe of 812 South 14th Street, Newark, has been notified.

Albe, 19, was born in Newark and lived in Verona two years before moving back to Newark six years ago. He attended Barringer Evening High School and enlisted in the Marine Corps in June, 1942. He leaves also a sister, Jacqueline, 9.

Newark Evening News, July 24, 1945

Arthur Lyon Albe

ID: 00536348

Entered the Service From: New Jersey

Rank: Corporal

Service: United States Marine Corps

Died: Sunday, June 17, 1945

Buried at: Honolulu Memorial

Location: Honolulu, HI, USA

Plot: M Grave: 24

Awards: Purple Heart
